title: BLOODY TEEMO
body: i think that to make teemo's Q a bit more fair is to make it a skill shot, then he would need to require a bit more skill

replies.body:
It's Teemo, don't get caught with it is easier said than done, but he has like 40 health and dies quite fast.

If you play Ranked and see a Teemo, look for who could possibly be in the other lanes and try to counter him with someone who does not need AA and you should be right.
i know but it would be pretty coll for it to be a skill shot instead a point and click
no it really wouldnt, turning everything into a skillshot over point and click isnt always just gonnna automatically balance things out. thats not what any champ is really about
Not really, the idea is good, but than Teemo needs to be buffed with defense. He is too weak to have a skill shot. That or give his W something more that helps him escape, currently, he has none.
